pages.content: It is| the smallest| planet| in the solar| system.
It is| the closest| planet| to the sun.
It gets| very hot| during| the day.| But| it gets| very cold| at night.
It orbits| the sun| faster than| any other| planet.| One year| on Mercury| is 88 days| on Earth.
It spins| very slowly.| The spin| makes day| and night.| One day| on Mercury| is 59| days| on Earth.
Mercury| is a terrestrial| planet.| It has| the most| craters| in the solar| system.
There is| no rain| or wind.| No air,| either!| Living things| cannot| live there.
Look up| in the sky!| You can see| Mercury| on some nights| from Earth.
